messages.message:
I had some Interesting Conversations with AI Hub,
2 strange thing
1 He started asking questions to me - "What is Instabase?"
 2 He knew about Instabase, although no info in doc

This is crazy! :joy: 
Tagging @Varun Jain for vis

Interesting! Hallucinations are possible, and we only have very basic guardrails right now to prevent such behavior.

cc: @vineeth @Rafal

Chat app is meant to take questions alone and there is no history maintained between queries. Each one is a standalone question. If the input query isn't a question, the model behaviour is unpredictable and most often than not the model itself asks a question.
